text: "Pompeii" is a 2013 song by British band Bastille and is the fourth single from their debut studio album Bad Blood. It topped the single charts in Ireland and Scotland. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, the Czech Republic, Germany, Israel, Italy, Luxembourg, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States. == References == Category:2013 songs Category:Bastille (band) songs
title: Pompeii (song)
